title: Favourite 1350 and below skin and why?
body:
No skins above 1350 because they're obviously better in all aspects.
You must also own the skin

I'll start

Championship Thresh - Because the model looks more metallic and curved, as well as having more armor'esque asthetic, blue is my favourite colour and the skin is now unavailable making me feel special even though i know its not that rare.

replies.body: Warring kingdoms Nidalee, cause that cougar is bad ass as fuck.

Arctic Warfare Caitlyn
Debonair Ezreal
Hazmat Donger
Sandstorm Katarina

Really the only champs I play so these are my favourite skins ^^

Notting Ham Ezreal, #1 Ezreal is my favorite champion and this skin's design and splash art just fit him. #2 I dislike the complexity of Pulsefire Ezreal and like this simple skin more (probally just my opinion) #3 I just really like it :D{{champion:81}}

Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao

It gives you the perfect feel of a fantasy-like Chinese warrior and it has really neat animations
soul reaver draaaaaaven so sexy, its draven.
